Articles.Content:
I need an icon which will fill the following requirements:

  • Two sizes, 38x38 and 24x24, these are the sizes of the buttons on the stock and Blizzy toolbar
  • Needs to convey the idea of a throttle, preferably a throttle limit
  • Would be nice if it could indicate that it is a multiple (ie: the button works for multiple throttles)

Also, this mod is under the GPL, so the icons need to be the same.

Looking forward to all the great ideas I know are floating out there
